description:
My comfy place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. The perfect place that hugs you when you get home after a long day out and about in the city. Close to Prospect Park, Cafes, bars and anything else your heart desires.

Beautiful  morning light, and warm in the winter. This space is a relaxing and inspiring place. if you need to work or just find some quiet.

There are 2 bus lines on the corner. And a 7 min walk to Subway access: B,D,Q, 2&3 lines.
You are on the corner of 7th Ave where there is everything you could possibly need. And more on 5th Ave!
name: Park Slope Haven
review: A toasty little apartment in an excellent location. Peta was a very friendly & laid-back host, who made us very welcome.
